spec: update the restartDocker script to match the functionality of testAndRestartDocker and in the process factor out a startDocker script which will do the verification of container health and outputting logs etc
commitMessage:
Refactored Docker scripts:
- Created new startDocker.sh with common container startup and health check logic
- Updated restartDocker.sh to use startDocker.sh
- Updated testAndRestartDocker.sh to use startDocker.sh
- Made all scripts executable
